Reviews.Title: “Average, but I'll still never book a room here again.”
Reviews.Author: Nova1919
Reviews.Content: ive stayed 3 times time double basement stayed friend decor adorable adequate liked sooo time stayed time booked double arrived single told booked prepaid double told single refund difference prepaid company contact actually run money refunded contact hotel honored reservation dropped hassle dollars anyhow single sufficient didnt hold third time booked deluxe thats called larger offered boyfriend 6pm top floor upstairs deluxe yes lug suitcases 3 flights stairs door larger ive stayed barely walk bed downstairs tell thats deluxe instead hotel street im pretty loud professional door day hotel street wish remember name fantastic spacious microwave fridge etc id definitely stay anyhow fared ok stays hotel time bit hassle moving lie confused lot makes leary dealings look hassle free getaway

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel for our first time visiting London”
Reviews.Author: Leesa M
Reviews.Content: extremely impressed hotel ridiculously clean extremely cosy staff helpful try check hour earlier unfortunately wasnt ready road main street tons restaurants fast food incredibly handy checked bother microwave meant little nights save bit money bed incredibly comfortable location hotel exactly looking earls court station literally 2 minute walk road managed pretty london day tube passes perfect location sight seeing getting central london draw sky light blind wasnt managed fix otherwise bit tilted slant didnt look fantastic windows hotel apart sky light little bit stuffy times window brilliant main air con didnt fantastic little air con machine provided corner job morning 740am sounded fire alarm thats wake guests shock hotel exactly staff incredibly busy polite definitely recommend staying stay wonderful

Reviews.Title: “not realy executive”
Reviews.Author: busmanHull
Reviews.Content: traveled wedding aniversary ok windows 3 sized curtains window window kept tripping cold night heating looked blanket accross road main hotel breakfast choise cooked breakfast cold mornings stayed nightlife hotel hear lot traffic noise night

Reviews.Title: “Great location, poor service”
Reviews.Author: Phairy
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week partner business trip excellent location close tube street conference centres london standards wasnt bad move bed pull chair table sit friend staying stayed town house road whcih excellent coming etc unfortunately everytime left hotel card stopped traipse main hotel reset time fifth time getting annoyed especially late night etc reception didnt happening lot guests suggested keeping card mobile phones credit cards etc failed suggested tube single apology inconvenience reset time walked past town house save time note noisy pretty day dont stay main hotel dont choice gym breakfast standard id recommend hotel stay key fixed

Reviews.Title: “Cheaters”
Reviews.Author: akzah
Reviews.Content: checked reviews mentioned moved hotel apon arrival exactly happened mentioned boiler trouble mentioned air conditioning wasnt arguing minutes stay road town house tiny barely move decided terrible checked hour promised refund told

Reviews.Title: “We will come again...”
Reviews.Author: roseandco
Reviews.Content: ideal expensive london location 1 minute earls court tube 15 minute walk street ken lots eat coffee starbucks pauls etc nearby 2 chairs sitting flat screen tv freeview basic channels decent toiletries comfortable bed air conditioning welcome hotel road access fridge cold water orange juice microwave didnt base london short breaks

HotelInfo.Name: Hogarth Executive Rooms by Shaftesbury
HotelInfo.Address: 33/37 Hogarth Road | Kensington, London SW5 0QQ, England
